text.div:
Test status values

Codes representing possible values for the Test status element

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-status
    CodeDisplay
    finalPerformedThe observation is complete and there are no further actions needed. Additional information such "released", "signed", etc would be represented using [Provenance](provenance.html) which provides not only the act but also the actors and dates and other related data. These act states would be associated with an observation status of `preliminary` until they are all completed and then a status of `final` would be applied.
    registeredOrderedThe existence of the observation is registered, but there is no result yet available.
    finalCompletedThe observation is complete and there are no further actions needed. Additional information such "released", "signed", etc would be represented using [Provenance](provenance.html) which provides not only the act but also the actors and dates and other related data. These act states would be associated with an observation status of `preliminary` until they are all completed and then a status of `final` would be applied.
